client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first met Lang Huber Graf at a luxury car show in Vienna. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Lang Huber Graf is a 23 year old and comes from Austria.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
client_description_Family_Background: Lang Huber Graf is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Lang graduated from BORG Gerasdorf in 2019.
Lang completed his university studies at Vienna University of Economics and Business in 2024.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Lang Huber Graf is a 23 year old and comes from Austria.
Lang Huber Graf did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not save any money from his earnings.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 2810000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2019.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Lang navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
